Label: filename
Description: Name of the raw file (or the first of a set) from which the dataset for the current averaging interval was extracted

Label: date
Description: Date of the end of the averaging period

Label: time
Description: Time of the end of the averaging period

Label: file_records
Description: Number of valid records found in the raw file (or set of raw files)

Label: used_records
Description: Number of valid records used for current the averaging period

Label: Tau
Description: Corrected momentum flux

Label: qc_Tau
Description: Quality flag for momentum flux

Label: rand_err_Tau
Description: Random error for momentum flux, if selected

Label: H
Description: Corrected sensible heat flux

Label: qc_H
Description: Quality flag for sensible heat flux

Label: rand_err_H
Description: Random error for momentum flux, if selected

Label: LE
Description: Corrected latent heat flux

Label: qc_LE
Description: Quality flag latent heat flux

Label: rand_err_LE
Description: Random error for latent heat flux, if selected

Label: gas_flux
Description: Corrected gas flux; water vapor units mmol m-2 s-1

Label: qc_gas_flux
Description: Quality flag for gas flux

Label: rand_err_gas_flux
Description: Random error for gas flux, if selected

Label: H_strg
Description: Estimate of storage sensible heat flux

Label: LE_strg
Description: Estimate of storage latent heat flux

Label: gas_strg
Description: Estimate of storage gas flux

Label: gas_v-adv
Description: Estimate of vertical advection flux

Label: gas_molar_density
Description: Measured or estimated molar density of gas

Label: gas_mole_fraction
Description: Measured or estimated mole fraction of gas

Label: gas_mixing_ratio
Description: Measured or estimated mixing ratio of gas

Label: gas_time_lag
Description: Time lag used to synchronize gas time series

Label: gas_def_timelag
Description: Flag: whether the reported time lag is the default (T) or calculated (F)

Label: sonic_temperature
Description: Mean temperature of ambient air as measured by the anemometer

Label: air_temperature
Description: Mean temperature of ambient air, either calculated from high frequency air temperature readings, or estimated from sonic temperature

Label: air_pressure
Description: Mean pressure of ambient air, either calculated from high frequency air pressure readings, or estimated based on site altitude (barometric pressure)

Label: air_density
Description: Density of ambient air

Label: air_heat_capactiy
Description: Specific heat at constant pressure of ambient air

Label: air_molar_volume
Description: Molar volume of ambient air

Label: ET
Description: Evapotranspiration flux

Label: water_vapor_density
Description: Ambient mass density of water vapor

Label: e
Description: Ambient water vapor partial pressure

Label: es
Description: Ambient water vapor partial pressure at saturation

Label: specific_humidity
Description: Ambient specific humidity on a mass basis

Label: RH
Description: Ambient relative humidity

Label: VPD
Description: Ambient water vapor pressure deficit

Label: Tdew
Description: Ambient dew point temperature

Label: u_unrot
Description: Wind component along the u anemometer axis

Label: v_unrot
Description: Wind component along the v anemometer axis

Label: w_unrot
Description: Wind component along the w anemometer axis

Label: u_rot
Description: Rotated u wind component (mean wind speed)

Label: v_rot
Description: Rotated v wind component (should be zero)

Label: w_rot
Description: Rotated w wind component (should be zero)

Label: wind_speed
Description: Mean wind speed

Label: max_wind_speed
Description: Maximum instantaneous wind speed

Label: wind_dir
Description: Direction from which the wind blows, with respect to Geographic or Magnetic north

Label: yaw
Description: (degrees) First rotation angle

Label: pitch
Description: (degrees) Second rotation angle

Label: u*
Description: Friction velocity

Label: TKE
Description: Turbulent kinetic energy

Label: L
Description: Monin-Obukhov length

Label: (z-d)/L
Description: Monin-Obukhov stability parameter

Label: bowen_ratio
Description: Sensible heat flux to latent heat flux ratio

Label: T*
Description: Scaling temperature

Label: (footprint) model
Description: Model for footprint estimation

Label: x_offset
Description: Along-wind distance providing <1% contribution to turbulent fluxes

Label: x_peak
Description: Along-wind distance providing the highest (peak) contribution to turbulent fluxes

Label: x_10%
Description: Along-wind distance providing 0.1 (cumulative) contribution to turbulent fluxes

Label: x_30%
Description: Along-wind distance providing 0.3 (cumulative) contribution to turbulent fluxes

Label: x_50%
Description: Along-wind distance providing 0.5 (cumulative) contribution to turbulent fluxes

Label: x_70%
Description: Along-wind distance providing 0.7 (cumulative) contribution to turbulent fluxes

Label: x_90%
Description: Along-wind distance providing 0.9 (cumulative) contribution to turbulent fluxes

Label: un_Tau
Description: Uncorrected momentum flux

Label: Tau_scf
Description: Spectral correction factor for momentum flux

Label: un_H
Description: Uncorrected sensible heat flux

Label: H_scf
Description: Spectral correction factor for sensible heat flux

Label: un_LE
Description: Uncorrected latent heat flux

Label: LE_scf
Description: Spectral correction factor for latent heat flux

Label: un_gas_flux
Description: Uncorrected gas flux

Label: gas_scf
Description: Spectral correction factor for gas flux

Label: spikes
Description: Hard flags for individual variables for spike test

Label: amp_res
Description: Hard flags for individual variables for amplitude resolution

Label: drop_out
Description: Hard flags for individual variables for drop-out test

Label: abs_lim
Description: Hard flags for individual variables for absolute limits

Label: skw_kur
Description: Hard flags for individual variables for skewness and kurtosis

Label: skw_kur
Description: Soft flags for individual variables for skewness and kurtosis test

Label: discontinuities
Description: Hard flags for individual variables for discontinuities test

Label: discontinuities
Description: Soft flags for individual variables for discontinuities test

Label: time_lag
Description: Hard flags for gas concentration for time lag test

Label: time_lag
Description: Soft flags for gas concentration for time lag test

Label: attack_angle
Description: Hard flag for attack angle test

Label: non_steady_wind
Description: Hard flag for non-steady horizontal test

Label: var_spikes
Description: Number of spikes detected and eliminated for variable var

Label: AGC
Description: Mean value of AGC for LI-7500RS or LI-7200RS

Label: RSSI
Description: Mean value of RSSI for LI-7700, if present

Label: var_var
Description: Variance of variable var

Label: w/var_cov
Description: Covariance between w and variable var

Label: extravar_mean
Description: Mean value of extravar
